body: "I thought that after Duvalier left, things in Haiti were going to improve. What I never imagined was that the leaders who came after Duvalier were going to take Duvalier's concepts and use them to their own benefits": Changing Perspectives republishes an interesting take on Haitian politics by Richard Morse (popular Tweeter @RAMHaiti).

What I never imagined was that the leaders who came after Duvalier were going to take Duvalier's concepts and use them to their own benefits": Changing Perspectives republishes an interesting take on Haitian politics by Richard Morse (popular Tweeter @RAMHaiti).
title: Haiti: Time for a Change

sentence: "I thought that after Duvalier left, things in Haiti were going to improve.

What I never imagined was that the leaders who came after Duvalier were going to take Duvalier's concepts and use them to their own benefits": Changing Perspectives republishes an interesting take on Haitian politics by Richard Morse (popular Tweeter @RAMHaiti).
